content: from doctor who everyone s favorite robot dog k-9 in doily form i designed this pattern for filet crochet but because it is a chart you may also use it for knitting or other needle arts the chart including a two square border is 97 x 71 squares this is the large version i also have posted the pattern for a much smaller version please give me credit if you post or link elsewhere for more information see http //community livejournal com/crafty_tardis/62127 html for more information see
